TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted.

But you have no inspiration at all.

I wish for the version 1.0 of KSP >:-(

Stop wishing for that granted the world ends

i wish wish for a crisp dollar and a quarter

granted. the dollar is in 100 shreds and the quarter in 4 peices.

i wish for you to stop asking for starwhip in the "guess who will reply next" fourm game. its starting to get on my nerves

Granted. Ethan stops. Everybody else starts asking for Starwhip all the time. Enjoy.

I wish for a good cup of cofee.

Granted. Your coffee is cold however after the time it took to deliver it (Good coffee is nto near you, and hard to find!)

I wish for darkness.

Granted. Ahh, you think darkness is your ally? You merely wished for darkness. I was given power over it, granting it to anyone who wishes for it. I didn't see the light until I turned off my computer and went outside, and by then it was nothing but blinding. *meanwhile the darkness has caused you loss of vision, and since you were born to function around vision, you die due to your other senses never sharpening and you doing clumsy things*

I wish for more batman references.

Edited March 23, 2015 by manni01

Granted. Batman and Robin.

I wish the movie was actually good. The one scene with all the puns just makes me die every time.

Granted, but it is still crap.

I wish to be the 1000th poster.

Edited March 24, 2015 by MegaUZI

Granted. But you got ninja'd.

I wish that I could wish what I want to wish but wish I didn't want to wish because I can't wish that wish.

Granted. ERROR. ERROR. 404WISH NOT FOUND

I wish for a NES.

Granted. Enjoy your obesity.

I wish my vacation wasn't over.

Granted. You lose your job.

I wish for a SNES. The Gaming Console.

Granted. No cartridges for it.

I wish for a 747.

Granted. It is bright pink.

I wish for a B in Chemistry.

Granted. You accidentally ingest a large quantity of B (element) in chemistry class.

I wish for an IBM Mainframe.

Granted. You get some boron but still fail the course. Ninja'd!

Granted. It's an IBM mainframe from the '60s, your mobile phone is orders of magnitude more powerful.

I wish chemistry jokes got a better reaction.

Goatee you get a icbm missle

i wish for a nice house

Granted. It's in Siberia, 1000km from the nearest city. Oh, and did I mention that the highest temperatures are around -273,15Ã‚Â°C?

I wish to be an evil warmonger.

Granted: he kills you. And your little dog to.

I wish for 10000th

Granted. You get a 10000th consecutive punch.

I wish for puntsch (the spelling is correct!)

Granted: Buffalo buffalo buffalo

I wish for a green iron crown.

Granted. Your crown is now green. The arsenic green. You can't get the crown down.

I wish I won the race for post #10000.

Granted: #ninjad

I wish for a science!

Granted. Someone then deletes one of their previous posts, shifting your post to #9999.

I wish to get a second post #10,000.

Granted. I won!

I'd like to thank my main man Janathan and my mom. I won

I wish for post 11111!
